acceptance_tests: All 7 piece types spawn and can be controlled
Pieces stop when hitting bottom or other pieces
Complete lines are detected and cleared
Score increases when lines are cleared
Game over triggers when pieces reach top
Rotation works correctly near walls and other pieces

constraints.rotation_system: Standard rotation system with wall kicks

goal: Create a fully functional Tetris game with classic gameplay mechanics
recommendations: Start with core gameplay loop before adding advanced features
Use a component-based architecture for easy feature additions
Implement comprehensive unit tests for game logic
Consider using a game engine or framework for rendering and input handling

must: Implement 7 standard Tetris piece types (I, O, T, S, Z, J, L)
Pieces fall from top of playing field under gravity
Player can move pieces left and right
Player can accelerate piece drop speed
Complete horizontal lines are cleared from the board
Game ends when pieces reach the top of the playing field
Implement collision detection between pieces and boundaries
should: Increase falling speed as game progresses (levels)
Show ghost piece (preview of where piece will land)
Implement proper Tetris scoring system (single, double, triple, Tetris)
Add sound effects for piece placement and line clears
